info.name: Hilton Garden Inn Tirana
info.description: We're five minutes' drive from city
info.longDescription: We're five minutes' drive from city center and the business district. Et'hem Bej Mosque and attractions on Skanderbeg Square are three kilometers from our door, and Tirana Airport is 15 km away. Enjoy cooked-to-order breakfast, meals in our restaurant, and evening room service. Drinks and snacks are available from The Shop. WiFi is free.
